name: Brandon Stacy
biography: A chameleon, formally trained at James Madison University. With degrees in Theatre and Film Studies, Brandon continued developing his craft at Ivana Chubbuck Studios in Los Angeles, and Second City in Chicago. Known for his unique application of humor, passion, and underlining fire, Brandon brings an elevated level of intensity and truth to his work, regardless of genre.::Manager
